After my mother died, my father always got drunk and
kept scolding me. But he was unusually quiet a few days
before he disappeared.
Father has been missing for almost a month.\!
There is no other possibility except suicide. But even
if he were still alive, I would not change my plan.
I didn’t feel sorrow.\!
Just like when my mother committed suicide, I just felt
angry. \!“It’s like this again, and it’s just me who
is experiencing this.”.
My father and mother both abandoned me.\!
But it's not like I was left with nothing.
...At least, my father left me the gun.
My mother killed herself half a year ago.\!
My father ran away from home a month ago and never
came back.
Although it is not a perfect family at all, but I also
had the thought "maybe it will get better one day."
...But, this world,\.
even such a tiny wish doesn't allow me to have it.
When it comes to food, just instant noodles, cans and
curry. The refrigerator is full of expired seasonings
and nothing fresh.
My mentally ill mother often used the kitchen knife to
hurt herself.\!
After that, there were no knives in the kitchen.
The gas had been shut off long ago.\!
Therefore, when processing the chemicals needed to make
bombs, it was necessary to bring out the gas stove.
Because of the arrears, I can’t make calls from my home
phone. \!Having said that, the only calls I received were
from people collecting debts and inducing financing.
The call rang hundreds or thousands of times,\!
then all I can hear is money, money, money...
Every time I explained that my parents were dead,
they would call me a liar in a surprised tone.
The reason makes me hesitate to pull the trigger,
I will never find it even if I search the whole society.
All the magazines are from a few years ago.\!
None of them are new.
Dusty clutter was piled tangledly together.\!
I don’t know when, but I can’t even find a single
family photo from my childhood.

Although everyone said in unison that
"Life is a very precious gift given to us"
If there is no life, there will be no injuries.\!
If there is no life, there will be no bloodshed.\!
If there is no life, there will be no life taken away.
Even so, if you still insist on your position. Then if
you or someone close to you is injured, bleeding,
or even loses his life......
You must accept it well!
Because that is also brought by "Precious Life".
Ah, life is beautiful. \!Life is wonderful.\!
Even if brain was blasted out by subsonic bullets.
Even if whole body was ripped to shreds by pipe bombs.
It has been several years since the whole family had
a meal together. \!Since then, I have been eating alone.
Ever since my mother decided to commit suicide,
I had thought about finding a few random families in
the street and killing them all.
I hate this shit called family.
…But I decided to target the school.\!
Simply breaking one or two families apart is not enough
to appease my hatred.
I'm going to destroy dozens and hundreds of families!\!
Hundreds of thousands of families will suffer!
......That way.
The long and lonely time spent here is not meaningless.
A
A
Before I knew it, I began to think about killing people
frequently.
Long before my mother committed suicide,
I began to imagine killing everyone in school with
a gun or a knife.
I don't feel guilty about fantasies like this.\!
It's not because I don't have a conscience.
There is no one around me who is worth cherishing.\!
So, my conscience will no longer hurt.
If I had a friend, I would never kill that friend.
...But I have no friends.\!
So even if I kill everyone, I won't feel any heartache.
var distance = $gameMap.distance($gamePlayer.x, $gamePlayer.y, $gameMap._events[this._eventId]._x, $gameMap._events[this._eventId]._y);
var volume = 50 - (distance * 5);
if (volume < 10) volume = 10;
AudioManager.playBgs({"name":"town","volume":volume,"pitch":100,"pan":0});
The school can be seen from here.\!
The school I hated the most.
Sadly, while my life was falling apart,
the view from here hadn't changed at all.
Whenever the school bell rang,
I seemed to hear everyone laughing at my pain.
…But this is all going to end.\!
From today on, everyone will be my friend.\!
Let’s suffer together.
A
A
If I end my life now,\!
then the teachers in the school will definitely say————
"She's still so young" \."So pitiful"\. and so on,
which is nothing more than verbal, empty sympathy.
"Life is precious" \."You are not alone"\.
"If you have any troubles, please talk about it"\.
"If you see someone in trouble, help them"
In these clichés that have been used countless times,
my death will not touch anyone's heart.
As time goes by, the traces of my past life will
disappear bit by bit.\!
In a blink of an eye, my existence will be forgotten.
I will not choose that ending.\!
Even if everyone wants it that way.
Even if I only have one bullet left,
I will use it to kill everyone.
With all the pain I've endured so far.\!
With all the anger and hatred I have for everyone.
I won't do anything pointless.\!
Absolutely.
Bills and demand letters piled up.\! The scheduled
deadline for stopping power delivery due to non-payment
of electricity bills has expired. After gas, it is only
a matter of time before the power supply is cut off.
I usually stay in my room without taking a shower.
I took a good shower this morning.\!
Today is the first and last time in my life that
I will be on a grand stage.
My mother hanged herself in this toilet.\!
I was the first person to discover it.
…But I’m not really surprised.\!
I knew this day would come years ago, it was inevitable.
I was mentally prepared.
Even so, my mother's death still caused me great trauma.\!
At that moment, the anger and hatred that I had
accumulated for a long time burst out.
My mother died with hatred towards the world.\!
…But I will not die like that.
I will let many people die with hatred towards me,\!
and I will laugh at them while watching them die.
After witnessing my mother's death, I definitely didn't
want to become a suicide statistic like her.
My life is just a stepping stone for someone else,\!
I can only look at other people's smiles and then die,\!
I will never admit such a thing.
...But sometimes I wonder,\!
no matter how hard I struggle,isn't it already destined
that I will end up with a tragic ending where I can't
even get a glimmer of redemption?
even if it is God's will, I will never accept my fate!\!
What was I born for?\!
What was everyone born for?
It is not God, nor anyone else, who determines the
meaning of life.\!
It is not someone else, but me.
News
News01
\C[4]Newscaster\C[0]
"――The girl faced police interrogation and confessed
'I just want to try killing someone.I can kill anyone.'"
\C[4]Newscaster\C[0]
"――In recent years, shootings have continued to occur
in schools across the country.
"On December 15, 2014, in a shooting at a high school
in Yamazakai, after a female student in the first grade
threw explosives into multiple classrooms, using guns
to kill indiscriminately――
\C[4]Newscaster\C[0]
"This incident caused the death of 30 teachers and
students in the school. It is the most serious shooting
incident since the end of World War II.
"However, the debate on gun control has not made any
progress.\!The National Rifle Association, which strongly
opposes this, advocates making it compulsory for
teachers to carry pistols.
"In addition, they argue that the root cause of
juvenile delinquency is violent games, comics and
anime, and call for the regulation of these contents――
A
op4
op3
Whether it was the day my mother committed suicide
or the day my father disappeared.\!
Every day... I look at that school from here.
While my life was falling apart,
the scene I saw from here didn't change at all.
How sad it is... \!How unwilling it is.\!
I am the only one who is gradually breaking down.
I am the only one who is heading towards death.
......At the same time.
......Everyone is as usual.
...But that ends today.
...From today on,\| I won't be the only one suffering.
B
C

Empty plastic shochu bottles and cans of strong

My father was still drinking until he disappeared.
